alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Stewart (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 22 at 7:41AM CST until February 22 at 8:15AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Montgomery County in Middle Tennessee... Stewart County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 815 AM CST. * At 740 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dover, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dover, Clarksville, Big Rock, Cumberland City, Land Between The Lakes, Indian Mound, Palmyra and Woodlawn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for Middle Tennessee.
